coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: A tag discreetly sewn into the dress's inner lining informs you that it was made by 'Phlarx'.
coreAttributes.name: vintage dress
coreAttributes.description: A knee length dress that would look perfect on a pinup, or at a drive-in diner.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] the concealed side zipper, before pulling [npc.her] vintage dress off over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] the concealed side zipper, before pulling [npc2.namePos] vintage dress off over [npc2.her] head.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] the concealed side zipper, before roughly pulling [npc2.namePos] vintage dress off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the vintage dress down over [npc.her] head and torso, then [npc.verb(pull)] the concealed side zipper closed.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the vintage dress down over [npc2.namePos] head and torso, then [npc.verb(pull)] the concealed side zipper closed.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the vintage dress down over [npc2.namePos] head and torso, then [npc.verb(pull)] the concealed side zipper closed.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc.her] vintage dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] vintage dress.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] vintage dress.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc.her] vintage dress.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] vintage dress.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] vintage dress.
